Due to an unresolved JMRI issue, use of "Read Sheet(s)" will show incorrect values for the majority of settings on this pane.
Workaround: Switch to "CVs" pane and "Read Full Sheet".
<html>The correct from-decoder values will then be shown in all panes and can be changed/written.</html>

display.item: Sound Group 8 Dual Prime Mover Delay

label.text: Use this to pane to customize the brightness, timing, and fade of individual light generators

Lighting presets in WOWSound decoders utilize lighting effect generators to product an effect. Each generator is composed of 10 possible steps, but only those steps with values above 0 will be played. Set the brightness a lighting step starts and ends at, and then set how long you want it to take to transition between the start brightness and the end brightess. Customize a lighting effect below, and then map a lighting output to the effect.
Start and End brightness values are 0-100 and correspond to the percentage of full brightness
Duration values are 16-bit and each value of 1 = 5ms. Eg a duration value of 50 = 250ms
